question: With which French King were Mme de Pompadour and Mme Du Barry associated?
api_result: Mme de Pompadour and Mme Du Barry were both associated with King Louis XV of France. Mme de Pompadour was his official mistress from 1745 until her death in 1764, while Mme Du Barry became his mistress later, from 1763 until his death in 1774.
